name: Torchloop
description:
Torchloop is a PSX-style PvPvE extraction royale game with classic Dungeon Crawler elements, such as tile based movement and turning. You may play by yourself, with friends, or with strangers online. Join in to land in a procedurally generated dungeon and defeat harsh monsters in a dimly lit dungeon, collect loot, and get the hell out!

Theme: Duality

Once you have plundered the dungeon, crushed your enemies, and seen them driven before you, you must find an exit portal. There you will be faced with a Duality: escape with the loot you've collected and use them in the shop OR defer them and head deeper into the dungeon where more treasure (and more challenge) awaits you.
